scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:setup && concurrently -r npm:dev:web npm:dev:convex
scripts.dev:convex: pnpm exec dotenv -e .vercel/.env.development.local -- npx convex dev
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm exec dotenv -e .vercel/.env.development.local -- node test/backendHarness.cjs 'pnpm run test:e2e:run'
scripts.test:e2e:run: ./scripts/local-backend.sh convex env set IS_TEST true && ./scripts/local-backend.sh convex env set CLERK_JWT_ISSUER_DOMAIN "$CLERK_JWT_ISSUER_DOMAIN" && ./scripts/local-backend.sh convex deploy && playwright test --project=cross-platform
scripts.test:e2e:all: pnpm exec dotenv -e .vercel/.env.development.local -v VITE_CONVEX_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3210 -- node test/e2eRunner.cjs --all
scripts.test:e2e:browser: pnpm exec dotenv -e .vercel/.env.development.local -v VITE_CONVEX_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3210 -- node test/e2eRunner.cjs --browser
scripts.test:e2e:cli: pnpm exec dotenv -e .vercel/.env.development.local -v VITE_CONVEX_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3210 -- node test/e2eRunner.cjs --cli
scripts.test:e2e:cross-platform: pnpm exec dotenv -e .vercel/.env.development.local -v VITE_CONVEX_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3210 -- node test/e2eRunner.cjs --cross-platform
scripts.test:e2e:setup: pnpm exec dotenv -e .vercel/.env.development.local -v VITE_CONVEX_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3210 -- playwright test --project=setup
